Device.Name: STM32F302VC
Device.Description: ST's STM32F302CB operates at a maximum speed of 72MHz and features 256 Kbytes of Flash and 32 Kbytes of Internal RAM.

Parameters.Parameter: Core: ARM?Cortex-M4 32-bit CPU with FPU (72 MHz max), single-cycle multiplication and HW division, 63 DMIPS (Dhrystone 2.1) performance at 0 wait state memory access, DSP instruction and MPU (memory protection unit)
Memories:128 to 256 Kbytes of Flash memory;Up to 32 Kbytes of SRAM, with HW parity check implemented on the first 16 Kbytes.
Up to 87 fast I/Os.All mappable on external interrupt vectors.Several 5 V-tolerant
Serial wire debug, Cortex-M4 with FPU ETM, JTAG
Two operational amplifiers that can be used in PGA mode, all terminals accessible with analog supply from 2.4 to 3.6 V
8x16-bit timers with Input Capture, Output Compare and PWM functions
1x32-bit timers with Input Capture, Output Compare and PWM functions
